column1: 1. "As a child of a Christian, I saw the world in a different light"
2. "I was born to believe in Christ, and believe what I believe"
3. "I believe that my work is to make people better, not to make them poor"
4. "In my life I am not afraid to ask the question that bothers me the most, but I am willing to put out a fire when it is hot"
5. "I am not opposed to the idea of a political system that involves political parties"
6. "I am not opposed to a system that is based on fear of others"
7. "I am not opposed to the idea of a system that is based on fear of other people"
8. "I am not opposed to the idea of a system that is based on fear of social change"
9. "I am not opposed to the idea of a system that is based on fear of race"
10. "I am not opposed to the idea of a system that is based on fear of religion"
11. "I am not opposed to the idea of a system that is based on fear of sexuality"
12. "I am not opposed to the idea of a system that is based on fear of the sun"
13. "I am not opposed to the idea of a system that is based on fear of the earth"
14. "I am not opposed to the idea of a system that is based on fear of the moon"
15. "I am not opposed to the idea of a system that is based on fear of the stars"
16. "I am not opposed to the idea of a system that is based on fear of the moon"

19. "I am not opposed to the idea of a system that is based on fear of the stars"
